entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
